column2: an A.M. Eatery////Came here 9am sat morning and it was a 30-45 min wait for 2 people! We waited though and were happy we did. Got the corned beef hash with wheat toast and scrambled eggs
column3: and the French toast with side of sausage links. Both were delicious. The hash hit the spot though I have to admit I'm a kid and mixed together the eggs
column4: corned beef and potatoes... Mmmmmm. The French toast was yummy and the three sausage links were way bigger than expected. Would definitely come back.
